review: This is the worst TV streaming device that you can spend your money on. Apple TV shows everything that is wrong with Apple, it is over complicating things as simple as connecting your phone to it. Even if you have an iPhone or iPad made by the same people it will not connect. I have used both Roku and chromecast and have found that both are extremely superior to this idiotic product. Not only is the software atrocious but the remote is the worst engineered thing that Apple has ever put out. I spent money on this thinking that I would get something that would work specifically for my Apple devices. I just ended up buying a brick with an Apple logo on top. Boo Apple.
author: Ben Tozier
